backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing contact messages with submit and query methods, validating name input before appending to a var array.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs for deployment and interface validation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short descriptions summarizing key frontend files including components, hooks, scenes, and UI systems.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist describing the backend deploy, frontend build, and runtime steps along with diagnostic formats for troubleshooting.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark mode design tokens and base styles for the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx as the module script.
frontend/public/elementor/README-element: Guide for embedding the static 3D cafe build into WordPress Elementor with setup steps, features, limitations, and customization notes.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app combining the 3D scene with UI overlays, top navigation, and panel routing controlled via Zustand state.
frontend/src/components/layout/ContourFr: Layout wrapper applying textured background, rounded borders, and blurred frame styling for panel surfaces.
frontend/src/components/layout/PanelSurf: Generic panel container with title bar, close button, scrollable content area, and adaptive height handling.
frontend/src/components/nav/HelpButton.t: Floating help button with tooltip that triggers the onboarding or control overlay.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Top navigation bar showing branding and buttons that open About, Contact, and Menu panels.
frontend/src/components/overlays/Onboard: A dialog overlay that introduces users to interaction controls and tips for exploring the 3D cafe.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppViewport.ts: Sets a CSS variable for stable viewport height using visualViewport events to handle mobile browser chrome changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFirstVisitFlag.ts: Tracks whether the user has dismissed onboarding using localStorage and provides a dismiss handler.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for managing Internet Identity login, state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and submitting contact messages with runtime validation and diagnostics.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles using Tailwind with a custom color palette, viewport handling, typography, and safe-area utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPanel.tsx: A right-side sheet panel displaying information about Contour Cafe with scrollable content and UI sections.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPanel.tsx: Implements a slide-in contact form panel with input fields and submission via custom hooks, plus a messages section. Handles validation, loading states, and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/pages/ExportPanel.tsx: Provides a panel for downloading a static WordPress-compatible package, including instructions, feature notes, and a download link.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPanel.tsx: Renders a multi-tab menu panel with categories and items, and supports navigation to other panels via callbacks.
frontend/src/scene/CafeScene.tsx: Defines the core 3D cafe scene with basic lighting, a fallback room, navigation hooks, and error/ready event handling. Full environment loading is disabled in room-first mode.
frontend/src/scene/components/MenuBoardF: Creates a neon-style glowing frame mesh using shape geometry and emissive materials for decorative UI elements.
frontend/src/scene/components/WallFrameL: Generates a high-resolution canvas texture for crisp text and maps it onto a 3D plane for use as wall labels or signs.
frontend/src/scene/controls/useCafeNavig: Hook implementing keyboard and pointer-based camera navigation with touch detection, drag-to-look, and pointer lock support.
frontend/src/scene/environment/BasicCafe: Fallback 3D cafe room rendering simple floors, walls, lighting, and basic furniture with contour textures and labels.
frontend/src/scene/environment/CafeEnvir: Full cafe environment with physics floor, textured walls, detailed furniture, ceiling overlays, and mount diagnostics.
frontend/src/scene/environment/CafeFurni: Defines Counter, CafeTable, and WoodenChair components with contour-textured surfaces and basic geometry construction.
frontend/src/scene/environment/CafeScene: Adds scene props like espresso machine, grinder, pastry case, and menu board with contour textures and neon glow.
frontend/src/scene/environment/Commercia: Defines a detailed commercial espresso machine 3D model composed of meshes, group heads, steam wands, and a drip tray.
frontend/src/scene/HomeCafeCanvas.tsx: Sets up the main three.js canvas, manages loading and error states, handles WebGL support, and renders the CafeScene inside an error boundary.
frontend/src/scene/hooks/useContourTextu: Loads and configures a contour texture and creates floor, wall, and furniture variants with adjusted repeat and filtering.
frontend/src/scene/hooks/useNonBlockingT: Asynchronously loads a texture with logging and optional error callback, returning undefined on failure.
frontend/src/scene/hooks/useSceneStartup: Watchdog hook that triggers a timeout callback if a scene doesn't render in time and provides a cancel method.
frontend/src/scene/hooks/useWallMapTextu: Loads and configures a repeating green wall map texture with filtering and anisotropy settings.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/DoorCont: Animates a door opening and closing based on the camera's proximity using smooth rotation updates.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/Inspecta: Provides a draggable, rotatable prop with visual feedback and an on-screen hint when inspecting.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/Interact: Empty placeholder file for interaction management.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/PanelPro: Displays interactive floating props (card, cup, or sign) with hover, press feedback, and label text.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/POIMarke: Renders rotating POI markers with hover and dwell activation logic tied to camera direction and distance.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/poiRegis: Defines a registry of POIs with positions, labels, actions, and highlight colors for interaction components.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/Proximit: Detects when the camera enters predefined zones and shows an overlay to trigger related actions.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/ScenePan: Empty placeholder file for scene panel props.
frontend/src/scene/materials/contourStyl: Defines factory functions for Three.js materials (contour, wood, metal, overlay) and exports preset contour colors.
frontend/src/scene/SceneErrorBoundary.ts: A React error boundary that captures scene render errors and signals the parent while resetting on retry.
frontend/src/scene/ui/SceneDegradedOverl: Renders an overlay informing users that only the basic room loaded and provides a retry button.
Displays an error overlay for failed scene loads with optional diagnostic details and a retry action.
frontend/src/scene/ui/SceneLoadingOverla: Shows a loading screen for the scene and switches to a degraded-state overlay after a timeout.
frontend/src/scene/utils/sceneDiagnostic: Provides types and functions for logging scene load failures, successes, and formatting diagnostic stages.
frontend/src/scene/utils/webglSupport.ts: Checks browser WebGL support and required extensions, returning a support status and reason.
frontend/src/state/uiOverlayStore.ts: Zustand store managing which UI overlay panel is active.
frontend/src/theme/motion.ts: Defines motion easing, durations, spring presets, and a helper to generate transition strings.
frontend/src/theme/tokens.ts: Exports design tokens including colors, typography, spacing, and radii for theming.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentDiagnostics: Logs deployment-related errors with contextual details and remediation hints.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, radii, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, known deployment issues, and existing feature requirements for build, diagnostics, and interface validation.
